about_the_game:
Farcaster is a VR action shooter combining classic arcade FPS with fast-paced light gun shooter in an ever changing scenario. Ride flying platforms or paraglides, shoot and kill enemies, dodge bullets from all directions, and run and climb through immersive military bases. With its immersive world, arcade vibe and addictive gameplay, it's the kind of game that will keep you coming back for more. So what are you waiting for? Strap on your headset and get ready to ride and fight your way through the worlds of Farcaster!



Welcome to Farcaster! the heart-pounding shooting game that puts you in the shoes of a quick-witted gunslinger on the run. In this thrilling adventure, you must navigate a series of action-packed worlds, battling enemies and dodging bullets and obstacles as you ride on a floating platform. But don't worry, you won't be alone in this fight: you'll have your deadly revolvers at your disposal, will you have the skills to use them to defeat your enemies?



Not only will you experience heart-pumping action as you ride on the floating platform through the Farcaster portals, but there are also times when you will get off the platform and engage in classic FPS gameplay. These segments are crucial to advancing through the game's storyline and require you to use your skills to fight enemies and figure out how to progress across a range of different environments, from sprawling military bases to desolate wastelands, each with its own set of challenges. You'll have to use your wits to move through these environments, taking cover to avoid enemy fire and making split-second decisions as you take on the game's bosses.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 970 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Required
  • VR Support: SteamVR
  • Additional Notes: Headphones recommended

  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Required
  • VR Support: SteamVR
